name: Free Poster Mockup Scene
description:
Poster Mockup For Figma

Place your own designs to glued posters on the wall. You can move the walking guy, change the wall texture as you want, adjust the shadow on the wall.


You will never need Photoshop to create mockups again, Artboard Studio is the best mockup tool for Figma! Experience it yourself and let us know what you think in the comments below.


You can learn more about Artboard Studio plugin here.

You will see "How it works" page inside the project, you can easily activate and start making your mockup by reading this tutorial.
